replies.msg:
Protective conductor(s) may be formed by:
(i) a separate conductor or cable,
(ii) the metallic sheath or armour of a cable,
(iii) part of the same cable containing the associated live
conductors,
(iv) rigid steel conduits, trunking or ducting, or
(v) the metal enclosure of the wiring system.
